section.heading: Fuel provider requirements.
section.text: Pursuant to § 246(e) of the Clean Air Act, fuel providers shall make clean fuels available to covered fleet operators at locations at which covered fleet vehicles are fueled.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: “Section 246(e) of the Clean Air Act,” referred to in this section, is codified as 42 U.S.C. § 7586(e).
